A simple demonstration of recycler views and a basic bottom navigation template. Feel free to use as needed. Whilst loopj is not technically deprecated, it would be better to use another HTTP client if you are planning on making a production build. Moreover, the package structure is not ideal for very large projects! This project has minimal features to sort by, so this specific structure is easier for me here.
The robot icon used in the splash screen as well as the toolbar is made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com. All other images are parsed from or provided by Shopify.
Images are loaded thanks to Square\'s Picasso library. No proguard values are configured for it here as this is not a production build
